basics.name: Yuancheng Wang
basics.label: Ph.D. Student at CUHK(SZ)
basics.summary: A second-year Ph.D. student at CUHK(SZ), interested in text-to-speech synthesis, text-to-audio generation, and unified audio representation and generation.

work.name: Microsoft Research Asia
work.summary: Developed an audio editing model with latent diffusion, and a large-scale speech synthesis model.

internship.name: Microsoft Research Asia
internship.summary: Developed on audio generation & editing and larger scale text-to-speech synthesis.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

education.institution: The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen
The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen

awards.title: First prize of Guangdong Province for the Mathematics competition of Chinese College Student

publications.name: MaskGCT: Zero-Shot Text-to-Speech with Masked Generative Codec Transformer
publications.summary: A fully non-autoregressive large-scale zero-shot TTS model eliminates the need for phone-level duration prediction.

publications.name: Naturalspeech 3: Zero-Shot Speech Synthesis with Factorized Codec and Diffusion Models
publications.summary: A large-scale zero-shot TTS model achieves on-par quality with human recordings.

publications.name: SD-Eval: A Benchmark Dataset for Spoken Dialogue Understanding Beyond Words
publications.summary: We propose a benchmark dataset to evaluate spoken dialogue understanding and generation.

publications.name: AUDIT: Audio Editing by following Instructions with Latent Diffusion Models
publications.summary: The first audio editing model that can follow natural language instructions.

publications.name: Amphion: an Open-Source Audio, Music, and Speech Generation Toolkit
publications.summary: We develop a unified toolkit for audio, music, and speech generation.

publications.name: Emilia: An Extensive, Multilingual, and Diverse Speech Dataset for Large-Scale Speech Generation
publications.summary: We collect a 10w hours in-the-wild speech dataset for speech generation.
